title: Gab & Juls Show: How Stefano Pioli gets the best out of Rafael Leao
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss Rafael Le達o's star turn following AC Milan's 3-2 victory over their city rivals Inter. The guys also discuss Manchester United's 3rd win in a row, this time ending Arsenal's own unbeaten start to the season. All that plus Barcelona's transfer window, VAR scandals in the Premier League & why Diego Costa could be making a return to Europe.
